summary: A unit test module that validates authentication and permission enforcement for the Feast registry server APIs. It includes helper utilities to assess auth settings and permission presence, and runs a series of tests covering entity retrieval, feature view access, historical feature queries, and permission listings, confirming that appropriate errors are raised when permissions are insufficient.
business_intent: To guarantee that the Feast registry server correctly restricts access based on configured authentication and permission rules, thereby protecting metadata from unauthorized operations.
